QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N' pass_yn,
       aa.workspace,
       aa.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       aa.created_by,
       aa.created_on,
       aa.last_updated_by,
       aa.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Application `%0` (app %1) is using %2 deprecated ALVA end point(s)', 
        p0 => aa.application_name, 
        p1 => aa.application_id,
        p2 => ue.url_endpoints) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Application `%0` is using deprecated ALVA end points (app %1) ', 
        p0 => aa.application_name, 
        p1 => aa.application_id) issue_title,
       aa.application_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aa.application_name,
       aa.alias,
       aa.availability_status,
       ue.url_endpoints
from apex_applications aa
inner join (select aawsm.application_id, count(*) url_endpoints
            from apex_appl_web_src_modules aawsm 
            inner join apex_workspace_remote_servers awrs on  aawsm.remote_server_static_id = awrs.remote_server_static_id
            where awrs.base_url in ('https://ncygdjuof5g55ya3vehx3jzbeq.apigateway.us-ashburn-1.oci.customer-oci.com/mock', 
                                    'https://ncygdjuof5g55ya3vehx3jzbeq.apigateway.us-ashburn-1.oci.customer-oci.com/administration', 
                                    'https://oke-oc1-iad-alva-dev-0.ml-api.us-1.cernersvc.net')
            group by aawsm.application_id) ue on ue.application_id = aa.application_id
where aa.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
EXPLANATION:
